Synesis Software UNIX Emulation for Win32

Detailed Description

The UNIX emulation library.


Modules

 opendir()/readdir() API
 This API provides facilities for enumerating the contents of directories.
 dlopen() API
 This API provides facilities for manipulating dynamically loaded executable modules.
 glob() API
 This API provides facilities for enumerating the file-system contents.
 mmap() API
 This API provides facilities for manipulating memory-mapped files.
 Resource Usage API
 Resource usage functions and types.
 time() API
 Time functions and types.
 uio() API
 UIO functions and types.
 unistd.h
 Standard limits and declarations.
 setenv.h
 setenv() and unsetenv() functions
